name: On Running Pants - Women's
description: Stay warm and dry on your runs, no matter the weather. Stretchy fabric throughout the legs and rear, and articulated knees let you move freely, and vent holes on the front of the knees let hot air escape to keep you from overheating. Windproof panels on the front thighs protect you from gusts and a DWR finish sheds light rain. Wearing these to warm up or cool down? The ankle zips let you strip these off when its go-time and slide them back on once you're done, without having to remove your running shoes.Wicking polyester and elastane main fabric has 4-way stretch for freedom of movement.Brushed interior is soft against the skin.Nylon ripstop panels on upper leg are windproof and water-resistant to keep you dry and comfortable in inclement weather.Elastic waistband with drawcord provides a secure fit.Mesh knee vents release excess heat to keep you cool.Reflective detailing keeps you visible on low-light runs.
